description.value:
The Bastion represents the desire to protect, and the understanding that all forms of Defense can be used as a great offense. The Bastion's Shield exemplifies this need to protect others, and the lengths one will go to help them.

Constellation: @UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.deities.Item.3PJqDBXSNoaagwY8]{The Bastion}

First Asterism (Level 1): You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} general feat and you become Trained in Crafting. If you are naturally Trained in Crafting, you cannot critically fail a Repair check to repair a shield.

Second Asterism (Level 3, Trained in Crafting): You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.ASy9AKEIRxPYUi5o]{Quick Repair} skill feat, and you become an Expert in Crafting. If you are naturally an Expert in Crafting, you always at least succeed on your Repair checks on Shields.

Third Asterism (Level 7, Trained in Crafting): You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.AmP0qu7c5dlBSath]{Toughness} general feat, and you become a Master in Crafting. If you are naturally a Master in Crafting, you always critically succeed on checks to Repair a shield, and at 15th level, you are considered Legendary for checks to Repair shields and for the Quick Repair skill feat.
